cPostGateDisconnectNotification Class Reference

#include <cmodelchange.h>

Inheritance diagram for cPostGateDisconnectNotification:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This notification is fired at the end of cGate::disconnect(), to announce that the connection between the given gates has been deleted.

This notification is fired on the module that contains the source gate. of the connection. If you wish to listen on the target gate of the connection being disconnected, you should add the listener to the parent module (as notifications propagate up).

See also:
cPostPathCutNotification

Public Attributes

cGate * gate
cGate * targetGate
cChannel * channel

Member Data Documentation

cGate* cPostGateDisconnectNotification::gate

The gate that has been disconnected.

cGate* cPostGateDisconnectNotification::targetGate

The gate to which it was connected.

cChannel* cPostGateDisconnectNotification::channel

The channel object associated with the link; it points to valid object that will be deleted once the notification has finished.
